name: Obelisk - Daydream Interactive
description:
Obelisk is an action-adventure created by Daydream Interactive where two teams consisting of both a Spellcaster and a Rogue battle for resources to build an Obelisk, in an attempt to see who can first claim The Islands for their own.

Obelisk is intended to be played with four controllers.

Controls for Xbox Controllers:

Left stick - Move

Right stick - Adjust camera

A - Jump

X - Hold to  pickup large resource

B - Shoot

Classes:

The Rogue:

Collects resources and returns them to the base. Fast, Non-combatant.

The Spellcaster:

Hunts down the other team with deadly fireballs. Also is tasked with building each stage of the obelisk once the rogue has gathered the resources. Slow.

Obelisk (Non-networked edition) is a 4 player split-screen game (a networked version does exist but does not have the same functionality.)
